alert.note: Alert for Lonoke; Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 2:28PM CDT until July 03 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Lonoke County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 227 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Scott, or 10 miles southeast of Downtown Little Rock, and is moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Keo... Estes... Toltec Mounds State Park... Scott... Baucum... Bevis Corner... Willow Beach... Toltec... Terry Lock and Dam... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
